description: {"blocks":[{"key":"180th","text":"We present here a method to culture, fix, permeabilize, and stain R1441C or VPS35 D620N MEF cells to visualize transfected Myc-RILPL1 and endogenous TMEM55b or pRab10. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"37ju","text":"Paraformaldehyde 16% (Electron Microscopy Sciences 50-980-487)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0o8f","text":"PBS (Cold Spring Harbor protocol) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10eug","text":"TMEM55B polyclonal antibody (Proteintech 23992-1-AP)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pe8r","text":"Recombinant Anti-Rab10 (Phospho T73) antibody (Abcam ab241060)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"icak","text":"Myc antibody (Biolegend 626802)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bfaf","text":"Donkey anti-Rabbit 568 Alexa Fluor (Thermo Fisher A10042)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ec5bk","text":"Donkey anti-Mouse 488 Alexa Fluor (Thermo Fisher A-21202)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"duum1","text":"DMEM high glucose (Cytiva SH30243.01)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4e1mo","text":"Fetal bovine serum (Sigma #F0926)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83d56","text":"Microscope cover glass (Fisher 12-545-81)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crvq9","text":"FuGENE 6 transfection reagent (Promega E2691)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2bef4","text":"Seed R1441C MEF cells or VPS35 D620N MEF cells at 50-60% confluency in a six well plate in 2 mL of complete DMEM (DMEM containing 10% FBS and 1% penicillin-streptomycin) 24 hours before transfection. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8c1fd","text":"Transfect with Myc-RILPL1 plasmid with FuGENE 6 transfection reagent (E2691) at a 3:1 FuGENE:plasmid ratio using 2µg per well according to the manufacturer’s guidelines for 24 hours. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e3vvo","text":"Trypsinize cells and plate onto 12 mm glass coverslips resting in a six well plate at 60% confluency and leave cells to attach to coverslips in a 37ºC incubator with 5% CO2 for 24 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fm1dt","text":"If needed for MLi-2 conditions, add 200nM MLi-2 and leave in the incubator for 1.5 -2 hours. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"egg5e","text":"For Nocodazole, add 20µM Nocodazole and leave in the incubator for 1.5-2 hours. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4sj45","text":"Solutions needed: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akt8f","text":"4% PFA in 1x PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8uc8","text":"0.2% Saponin in 1x PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"uibu","text":"2% BSA in 1x PBS (blocking solution)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"nbgo","text":"Transfer each coverslip from the 6-well plate to a 24 well plate filled with ~400 µl 4% PFA per well and fix for 10 minutes at room temperature (all subsequent steps and solutions are at room temperature).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cg65u","text":"Wash 3x with 1x PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fb58i","text":"Permeabilize  cells with 0.2% Saponin in 1x PBS for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"lgle","text":"Wash 3x in 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bc771","text":"Block with 2% BSA in 1x PBS for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eqic6","text":"Incubate primary antibody in blocking buffer for 2 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5g7j4","text":"Dilute antibodies (see Materials) as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erdv4","text":"Rabbit anti-TMEM55B PA5-61760 (1:4000)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drl19","text":"Rabbit anti-pRab10 (1:1000)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cirr6","text":"Mouse anti-Myc (1:1000)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fi3kp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4hs9h","text":"Wash 3x with 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7sd40","text":"Incubate with 2º Antibody for 1 hour in the dark in blocking buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dvij4","text":"Dilute antibodies (see Materials) as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjk6f","text":"Donkey anti-Rabbit 568 for TMEM55b and pRab10 (1:2000) and ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83ooj","text":"Donkey anti mouse 488 for Myc (1:2000)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blhak","text":"DAPI (1:1000)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ep1qn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"als82","text":"Wash 3x with 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ca1v","text":"Use a Kimwipe held on the edge of the coverslip to remove excess liquid; Invert the coverslip onto 3µl Mowiol on a Gold Seal glass slide (size 1x3’’, 1 mm thick).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a4oak","text":"Allow coverslips to dry at RT overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a2523","text":"Image","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Immunofluorescence microscopy of  R1441C  or VPS35 D620N MEF cells
